attributes.title: Gave me Covid-19
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes that I would be educated in the ways of our president. The last thing I would ever expect was to get the “Chinese Virus”. Corona virus wasn’t the only virus I received from this app, it gave my phone an intense digital virus which then got passed to my laptop, printer and somehow my refrigerator. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!! Now I have to go to Best Buy.

attributes.title: Caused me to die 😭😢
attributes.review: Hello everyone I’m a ghost writing this review. I got this app to show my ✨ 𝙇𝙤𝙫𝙚 ✨ and ✨ 𝙎𝙪𝙥𝙥𝙤𝙧𝙩 ✨ for Mr orange 🍊. But sadly, I realized he is really bad, only after I died. He recommended that I should poop on my mother then eat it and then stab myself. Willingly, I did what he wanted, thinking I should trust him, but oh, he betrayed me 😢😔 sadly, me and my family bought 60 rally tickets, but now that I’m dead they’ll be attending my funeral that day boo hoo 😢 I’m sorry I failed you mr orange 🍊 .
